item.description:
Dark Brook Reservoir is just west of I-290 and is viewable from the Mass Pike. We will be launching south of the pike and will paddle our way across the reservoir and through the culvert (under the turnpike) which leads to the northern side of the reservoir. We will probably be out on the water for 1.5 -> 2 hours.

For more information:

http://www.mass.gov/d...

Please note that the attendee limit is specifically for limited parking, if coming together in one vehicle, please only select one attendee. Thanks!


Directions:

Take I-290 (towards the mass pike) to Route 12 South. Continue straight through three to four lights and take a right onto West Street (at the intersection where the entrance to Outback Steakhouse is). The boat ramp will be less than 500 yards on the right and parking is on the left, opposite the boat ramp. You have gone too far if you go under the highway. Please be sure to park on the unpaved side of the lot.
item.name: Kayak/Canoe Dark Brook Reservior (Auburn)
